mapper.select: SELECT vp.id, vp.video_id as videoId, v.name as videoName, vp.agency_id as agencyId, oa.name as agencyName, vp.play_address as playAddress, vp.play_start_time as playStartTime, vp.play_end_time as playEndTime, vp.visitor_count as visitorCount, vp.principal, vp.remarks FROM video_play vp LEFT JOIN org_agency oa ON vp.agency_id = oa.id LEFT JOIN video v ON vp.video_id = v.id WHERE oa.is_delete = 0 AND vp.id = #{id}
